choices: Lakewood Elementary and Elmwood Community Preschool get new vending machines
1253311.content: How should this group pack on the pounds?
1253311.title: Arthur, Buster, D.W., Ladonna, Bud, Molly, Jame...

choices: Meanwhile, D.W., Bud, Emily and James discover the same machines at Preschool
12533111.content:
One day at Lakewood Elementary, Arthur Read, Buster Baxter, Ladonna Compson, Muffy Crosswire, Allen "The Brain" Powers and Francine Frensky were heading for their lockers when they noticed a group of students gathered near something close by. "What's going on over there?" wondered Arthur.

"Let's check it out!" Francine suggested as they headed over. Managing to move through the crowd of students, they saw what all the commotion was about. There were three massive vending machines in front of the students. One for sodas, another for cookies, moon cakes, chocolate bars, mini doughnuts and other snacks and one just for potato chips.

"What's all this about?" Brain asked Prunella. "Apparently a benefactor installed all these vending machines throughout the school. I asked Principal Haney who this person was, but he said it was anonymous." Prunella explained as she grabbed a package of mini doughnuts she'd just purchased and left.

Prunella was right. Almost every hallway now had those three machines present. And almost every kid was at them throughout the day, often buying as many goodies as they could carry in their arms or backpacks. Even Arthur, Muffy, Buster, Francine and Ladonna got caught up in the snacking craze. In class, Brain noticed Arthur stuffing cookies into his mouth while Ladonna popped a powdered mini-doughnut into her mouth as Buster and Francine both munched on large candy bars.

At recess, every kid had some form on unhealthy snack in their hands as they played on the swings, roundabout, see saws and so on. The Tough Costumers (Binky, Rattles, Slink and Molly) were hanging out at the jungle gym as usual.

"You guys notice how much junk food everybody's been eatin' all day?" Rattles asked as he watched Fern and Sue Ellen walk past, gobbling down huge chocolate bars while carrying armfuls of more candy and other junk foods. "Even a bully like me knows that ain't healthy." He admitted with a somewhat concerned expression.

"Yeah. I like desserts an' stuff as much as the next kid, but even I gotta admit this' probably going too far." Binky agreed. "Molly? What's your thoughts?" He asked, only to see Molly taking a massive bite out of her own chocolate bar. "What? I decided to see what has everybody so hooked on these vending machines and got just one bar." Molly protested as she left, quickly inhaling her candy bar and grabbing a second from her pocket.

"Looks like they've got her too." Slink remarked in concern. "Well, at least the teacher seem okay with it." Binky remarked thoughtfully. It was true. Mr. Ratburn and the other teachers had barely, if at all, said anything negative about the enormous piles of snacks being brought into classes.

"Maybe this'll all blow over by next week or so." Rattles agreed as recess concluded a few minutes later and the kids started back inside, though not before stopping to buy more food for the rest of the day.
12533111.title: Lakewood Elementary and Elmwood Community Presc...

choices: The next day, Arthur, D.W. and their friends' month long sleepover begins
125331111.content:
At the same time, at Elmwood Community Preschool, Arthur, Molly and Ladonna's younger siblings D.W., James and Bud were getting ready for class when they saw D.W.'s friend Emily and several other kids in their class crowding around the same vending machines as at Lakewood.

"Hey, Emily, where'd these machines come from?" asked D.W. as the trio also approached the machines. "Ms. Morgan told me that they came from a generous benefactor but that it was anonymous." Emily replied as she grabbed a second package of mini doughnuts and headed into Ms. Morgan's classroom.

Over the next few hours, D.W., James, Emily, Bud, Lisa, the Tibbles and most, if not all, of their friends happily pigged out on their favorite snacks from the vending machines. And Ms. Morgan, like Lakewood's teachers, didn't say a word about it.

At recess, all of the kids, in addition to playing, kept snacking as they did. By the end of the day, the kid had eaten a big amount of snacks, but were still hungry. Jane, Arthur and D.W.'s mother, was waiting for D.W. when she came out, eating a chocolate bar. "Why, D.W., where'd you get that candy?" Jane asked in shock.

"We got vendy machines like at Arthur's school." D.W. explained as she finished the candy bar and then climbed into the car. Jane was quiet for a moment, but didn't say anything as she drove for home with D.W.

That night, at the Read household, Jane and David, Arthur, D.W. and Kate's dad, had something important to tell their two eldest children after a huge dinner. "Kids, there's something we need to tell you." David said to Arthur and D.W. after the dishes were loaded into the dishwasher. "What, Dad?" Arthur asked.

"Your father and I have decided to take a month long trip with Kate. And we've decided to leave you two home alone. This is a big responsibility but we think you two are old enough to handle it." Jane explained. "Grandma Thora's agreed to help out if you need any help with stuff around the house and I've already made plenty of food so all you'll need to do so put it in the microwave or oven. For those, just call Grandma Thora and she'll help you with those." David added with a smile.

Arthur and D.W. just looked at their parents in shock. Sure they'd been left home alone with or without Kate before, but that was always for a few hours. This time, it was gonna be for a whole month. "Don't worry, Mom and Dad. We can handle it." Arthur said confidently. "Yeah." D.W. agreed. "Great. By the way, Mrs. MacDonald and Mrs. Compson called earlier. They want to go on vacation with us and asked if it's okay for Molly, James, Ladonna and Bud to stay here as well." David added to Jane.

"I see no problem with that." smiled Jane as Arthur and D.W. smiled in excitement. "So, when would you guys leave?" Arthur asked as he began eating another candy bar. "Tomorrow while you guys're at school." Jane replied with a smile.
125331111.title: Meanwhile, D.W., Bud, Emily and James discover ...

choices: 23 weeks later, the kids (except the male TCs and Brain) get a weighty problem
1253311111.content:
The next day, at Lakewood Elementary, Arthur met up with Molly and Ladonna at the vending machines. "So, are you guys ready for our month long sleepover?" He asked as he munched on a chocolate chip cookie. "Yeah. Bud's so excited, he's like a squirrel durin' a nut festival." Ladonna joked with a smile as she chugged a can of soda.

"James' pretty excited for it too. Last night he kept running to the bathroom since he was so excited." Molly smirked slightly as she crunched potato chips. At that moment, the bell rang and the trio had to get to class, quickly grabbing their sodas and other armfuls of snacks as usual.

At lunchtime, the kids were shocked to find that, in addition to the new vending machines, the cafeteria now served only desserts for lunch. Once again, while most of the kids were happy at this (especially Buster), Brain and the male Tough Costumers were concerned.

"Don't you guys think you should lighten up on the desserts and snacks?" He asked Buster, Muffy, Francine, Arthur and Ladonna as they ate their trays of cake, pie, cookies and ice cream sundaes. "No way, Brain. We're gonna be okay with eating like this." smiled Francine as she ate a slice of apple pie.

"Yeah, it's only the second day, Brain. This is probably the best food we've eaten from the cafeteria so far this year." Muffy smiled as she put another forkful of cake into her mouth. Buster, his cheeks bulging with food, simply mumbled his agreement as he kept chewing.

Brain, knowing his friends weren't going to listen due to being so happy over having desserts 24/7, simply got up and went over to Binky, Rattles and Slink's table. Molly wasn't there as she'd gone to get a refill of desserts. "Why aren't you guys enjoying the desserts?" Brain asked out of pure bewilderment. "We are. We just don't do what Arthur and the others're doin'." Binky explained.

"Even we know that this' unhealthy, what our friends're doing. We do like desserts like everybody else, but even we know when to stop at the limit." Rattles agreed as Slink simply nodded his agreement. "You're smart, aren't you?" He added to Brain. "Um, yes?" Alan replied, confused to where Rattles was going with the question. "Well, what'll happen if this keeps up with the vendin' machines and dessert lunches?" questioned Rattles.

"Well, first our friends' energy'll wear off and they'll become lethargic." Brain explained. "And then what?" Slink asked. "They'll start to gain a large amount of weight." Brain finished as he stood up and got ready to return to class, leaving the three male Tough Costumers behind to ponder over what he'd just told them.

Later that day, Arthur, Molly, Bud, Ladonna, James and D.W. arrived at the Read household. Jane, David and Kate had already left, as the couple had said they would. Arthur took the key he'd been given and unlocked the door for the six to enter. "So, what's the sleeping situation gonna be like?" Molly asked as she and the others gathered in the living room, still eating some of their snacks from the vending machines.

"I was thinking that D.W., James and Bud could sleep in D.W.'s room and you and Ladonna could stay in my room." Arthur explained. The other five were quiet as they thought about it and then nodded. "Sounds good to me." Ladonna smiled. "Me too." Molly agreed as their respective younger siblings all agreed to the idea as well before they went to set up their stuff.
1253311111.title: The next day, Arthur, D.W. and their friends...

info.brief_description: Join Arthur, D.W. and all the others as they go on the adventures you dreamed of.
info.description:
There are a some rules that You must obey.

1. keep it clean.
2. Nothing rude.
3. Every chapter must never end the story
4. Their must never be a mean chapter or it will be deleted.
5. Weight gain is allowed.
6. If you want to Have the characters get age regressed, You must have excellent grammar with details.
7. No age Progression.
8. Remake episodes
9. Feel Free.
10. Have fun!
